p: Non-parametric Mann–Whitney t-test was used to analyze cellular infiltration by flow cytometry, virus titer, weight gain, and foot swelling. One-way ANOVA with Tukey posttests was used to analyze IgM and IgG titers. Neutralizing antibody titers were analyzed by Kruskal–Wallis test with Dunn's posttests. A P < 0.05 was considered to be significant.
